Package com.flipkart.service

Interface FlipFitUserServices

All Known Implementing Classes:
FlipFitUserServiceOperations
public interface FlipFitUserServices
Interface for FlipFit user-related services.

  • Method Details

    • cancelSlots

      boolean cancelSlots(int slotId)
      Cancels a booking slot identified by slotId.
      Parameters:
      slotId - The ID of the slot to cancel
      Returns:
      true if the cancellation was successful, false otherwise

    • getAllBookings

      List<FlipFitBookings> getAllBookings(String userId)
      Retrieves all bookings associated with a specific userId.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user to retrieve bookings for
      Returns:
      List of FlipFitBookings associated with the user

    • getAllGymsWithSlots

      List<FlipFitGym> getAllGymsWithSlots()
      Retrieves all gyms that have available slots.
      Returns:
      List of FlipFitGym objects with available slots

    • getAllGymsByArea

      List<FlipFitGym> getAllGymsByArea(String area)
      Retrieves all gyms located in a specific area.
      Parameters:
      area - The geographical area to filter gyms by
      Returns:
      List of FlipFitGym objects in the specified area

    • bookSlots

      boolean bookSlots(int gymId, int time, String email)
      Books a slot at a gym for a user identified by email.
      Parameters:
      gymId - The ID of the gym where the slot is being booked
      time - The time slot to book
      email - The email of the user booking the slot
      Returns:
      true if the booking was successful, false otherwise

    • validateUser

      boolean validateUser(String username, String pass)
      Validates a user's credentials against stored data.
      Parameters:
      username - The username to validate
      pass - The password associated with the username
      Returns:
      true if the credentials are valid, false otherwise

    • createUser

      void createUser(FlipFitUser flipFitUser)
      Creates a new user account with the provided details.
      Parameters:
      flipFitUser - The FlipFitUser object containing user details

    • verifyGymUserPassword

      boolean verifyGymUserPassword(String email, String password, String updatedPassword)
      Verifies a gym user's password against an updated password.
      Parameters:
      email - The email of the gym user
      password - The current password of the gym user
      updatedPassword - The new password to verify against
      Returns:
      true if the verification is successful, false otherwise

    • updateGymUserPassword

      void updateGymUserPassword(String email, String password, String updatedPassword)
      Updates a gym user's password with a new password.
      Parameters:
      email - The email of the gym user
      password - The current password of the gym user
      updatedPassword - The new password to update
